post.body: @mattrhodes - Can't you set up a Twilert service for new followers Dan ;) Now that would be awesome.
- Understandable, thanks for mentioning. If you could forward enquiry on to someone who can pick up would appreciate. Thanks.
- it takes 2 to tango ;)
- blog down again, it's getting horribly frequent, dreamhost? nightmarehost more like. Can you get someone to email me please?
- Will give MS Writer and the Wordpress Plugin a go and see which works the best, cheers for all the twadvice tweeple ;)
- Tried but there was formatting issues when importing it in to Wordpress, eg it didn't see the grid lines and text alignment was off
- Looking forward to your tweets, thanks for the follow.
- Thanks Rax, hope you're enjoying the break in France. Nice twitter Xmas card.
- It's a present,and an awesome one at that.There's lots of things in life there's no 'need' for, does that mean they are no gd?
- Cheers mate, much appreciated.. Tis exciting times. You finished work soon? Let's go for a beer / lunch.
- Just saw you and your fave bookmarks in NMA! Nice! Enjoy the W/E.
- Got it in one, tis downloadable content.
Automated DM upon me following = massive FAIL. I want to connect with a person not a robot.
My last day at Splendid 2day before the next adventure begins @ Consolidated in the new year.All gone so quick but loved every minute of it!
RT @twestival - Official announcement! The next Twestival will be on January 22nd 2009 so put it in your diaries! More info coming soon.
New blog post - Video interview with @jamie247 of P2PR (http://bit.ly/ajgI)
Is it not possible to do tables in Wordpress blog posts? Do I need a plugin?
Great Chanukah present from Bro - A years personal training sessions at Apple Store Regent St. One session a week for a year! That's insane!
So I caught up with @jamie247 of P2PR for lunch the other day, here's the video - http://bit.ly/litmanlivep2pr
I changed my twitter avatar using Twixenate at http://url.ie/z82
